body: HandlerBuiltinsAssembler::Generate_ElementsTransitionAndStore(KeyedAccessStoreMode store_mode) in builtins/builtins-handler-gen.cc generates the ElementsTransitionAndStore_* builtins. It dispatches on receiver.elements_kind (from_kind) and map.elements_kind (to_kind) via DispatchForElementsKindTransition, calls TransitionElementsKind(receiver, map, from_kind, to_kind, &miss) and then EmitElementStore(receiver, key, value, to_kind, store_mode, &miss, context, nullptr). On failures it TailCallRuntime(Runtime::kElementsTransitionAndStoreIC_Miss,...). This builtin implements the fast-path that performs an elements-kind transition (fast-to-fast transitions only) and then stores the value to the newly converted backing store.
explanation: This RAG entry captures the CSA/Torque implementation hotspot that performs elements-kind transitions followed by the element store. It is the builtin installed by KeyedStoreIC when an elements-kind transition is needed. The file and symbol are central to mapping IC→builtin→ElementsAccessor flows.
